channel.title: Item id's please
channel.description: I'm trying to release a [TUT] on how to add emotes to all skillcapes..the real skillcapes not like wildy capes, only need a few id's: hunter cape, agility cape, runecrafting cape, construction cape. telling me if they are trimmed or untrimmed would help too. Thanks, Kaelen. P.S if this is in the wrong section, move it please.
